comments.author: AlekSanter.7208
comments.body:
Well I just noticed it in the pull requests on github 4 days ago so I was kinda late with this. Well good to see it added.

https://github.com/arenanet/api-cdi/pull/518

comments.author: AlekSanter.7208
comments.body: Any chance for getting ingame mails to be added to the API? Would be good for a app that automatically backups into a searchable archive because the limit ingame is so low. And for apps that notify you of new ingame mails.
